thread.title: Apriva to Exhibit at the 2015 Atlantic Coast Exposition
thread.title_full: Apriva to Exhibit at the 2015 Atlantic Coast Exposition - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Apriva to Exhibit at the 2015 Atlantic Coast Exposition
text:
Leading Trade Show to Feature Major Suppliers in the Vending, Office Coffee and Food Service Industries
Scottsdale, Arizona (PRWEB) October 05, 2015
Apriva, the leading provider of secure end-to-end wireless transaction and information solutions, today announced that they will be exhibiting at the 2015 Atlantic Coast Exposition (ACE), October 8-10, 2015 in Myrtle Beach, South Carolina.
The 2015 Atlantic Coast Exposition (ACE) will feature attendees from across the United States, attracting major suppliers in product, equipment and food service industries. The expo will include informative educational sessions on key industry trends, which will correspond with training lessons for the maintenance of machines associated with those services.
WHO: Apriva participants will include: John Wojcik, Vice President of Business Development for Unattended Solutions; Carlos Canez, Sales Manager for Unattended Solutions; and Maria Hargrave, Executive Account Manager for Unattended Solutions. In addition, the event will include industry leaders in the vending, office coffee and food service industries.
WHAT: 2015 Atlantic Coast Exposition. Attendees can register for the event at the ACE website: http://www.atlanticcoastexpo.com/
WHEN: The 2015 Atlantic Coast Exposition will be held October 8-10, 2015. The exhibit floor will open from 2:00 p.m. to 6:00 p.m. EST on October 9 and from 10:00 a.m. to 2:00 p.m. EST on October 10.
WHERE: 2015 Atlantic Coast Exposition will be held at the Embassy Suites Kingston Plantation â€“ 9800 Queensway Boulevard, Myrtle Beach, SC 29572.
About Apriva
Founded in 2003, Apriva is the leading provider of end-to-end wireless transactions and secure information messaging solutions that meet the exacting security and reliability requirements of financial services providers, government entities, and public service sectors. Through its two operating groups, Apriva Point of Sale (POS) and Apriva Information Security Systems (ISS), the company offers customers fully-managed, end-to-end, security solutions that incorporate hardware, software, network infrastructure and management tools. For more information, visit http://www.apriva.com .
